creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: green cover; woman's head and neck painted in pinks and reds with bright green eyes, green background and bright green outline around image; side of binding in green and blue paint: KEALLY Richard C. Barlett; green paint applied around edges of pages; book contains hand-written text; one hundred and twenty-one black ink line drawings of woman in various angles and poses; drawings are numbered with book title, artist signature and date
medium: Pen and black ink drawings and hand-inscribed text on paper; bound volume with hand-painted cover
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: The Book of Keally
